TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseButtonEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs

summary.span: 提供滑鼠按鍵相關事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for mouse button related events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用具有下列事件： ， ， ， ， ， ，而且對應的通道事件。 is used with the following events: , , , , , , and the corresponding tunneling events. 類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。The class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse. ## Examples 下列範例會建立變更引發事件之物件的色彩的滑鼠按鈕事件處理常式。The following example creates a mouse button event handler that changes the color of the object that raised the event. 選擇的色彩取決於按下滑鼠按鈕。The color chosen depends on the mouse button which was pressed. 屬性就會檢查以判斷哪一個按鈕被按下。The property is checked to determine which button was pressed. summary.span: 取得與事件關聯的按鍵狀態。

span.span: Gets the state of the button associated with the event.
The state the button is in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。The class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse. ## Examples 下列範例會建立可處理事件之物件的色彩變更滑鼠按鈕事件處理常式。The following example creates a mouse button event handler that changes the color of the object that handles the event. 選擇的色彩取決於是否滑鼠按鈕已按下或釋放。The color that is chosen depends on whether the mouse button was pressed or released. [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsButtonStatePressed](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouseeventargsbuttonstatepressed)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsButtonStatePressed](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouseeventargsbuttonstatepressed)]

summary.span: 取得與事件關聯的按鍵。

span.span: Gets the button associated with the event.
The button which was pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供額外的屬性和方法來判斷滑鼠的狀態。The class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件的已按下滑鼠按鈕的色彩變更滑鼠按鈕事件處理常式。The following example creates a mouse button event handler that changes the color of an object depending on the mouse button which was pressed. 屬性就會檢查以判斷哪一個按鈕被按下。The property is checked to determine which button was pressed. [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsChangedButton](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouseeventargschangedbutton)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseEventArgsChangedButton](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouseeventargschangedbutton)]

summary.span: 取得按鍵被按一下的次數。

span.span: Gets the number of times the button was clicked.

value.span: 滑鼠按鍵被按一下的次數。

span.span: The number of times the mouse button was clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用一是要判斷是否已經發生按兩下滑鼠按一下。One use of is to determine whether a double mouse click has occurred. 某些類別會公開事件按兩下，例如事件類別。Some classes expose events for a double-click, such as the event on the class. 按兩下滑鼠時按兩下事件不在類別上公開，可以偵測到使用屬性上的事件資料。When a double click event is not exposed on a class, a double click can be detected by using the property on the event data. ## Examples 下列範例會建立決定單一、 雙線或三重按一下是否發生。The following example creates a which determines if a single, double, or triple click occurred. 屬性用來判斷按下的次數。 property is used to determine the number of clicks. [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseClickCountDoubleClick](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mouseclickcountdoubleclick)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseClickCountDoubleClick](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mouseclickcountdoubleclick)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub InvokeEventHandler (genericHandler As Delegate, genericTarget As Object)
protected: override void InvokeEventHandler(Delegate ^ genericHandler, System::Object ^ genericTarget);

param.name: genericHandler
param.span: 以特定型別的方式呼叫的泛型處理常式。

span.span: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.

param.name: genericTarget
param.span: 對其呼叫處理常式的目標。

span.span: The target to call the handler on.

summary.span: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式時為然後再叫用。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
